root.str: Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Mosquito by 18KPH.

Reduces damage taken from infantry small arms and vehicle machine guns by an additional 4%, explosions by an additional 9%, armor piercing machine guns by an additional 15%, and aircraft machine guns by an additional 16%. Reduced the bonus damage caused by C-4 by 25%.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Grassland Camo
Increases the Idle Timer on the Prowler to 9 minutes.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 8.75%
Don't let this control node fall!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 360 rounds.
Slowly replenishes the ammo of friendly soldiers in your vehicle.
Sometimes you'll need to jump. That's just how life is.
Slows and disorients enemies within its blast radius.
You automatically repair 2% health every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.
Applies one way shields to structure windows to help protect the defenders inside. TR only.
Apply the single use Indar Plateau camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
A laser sight increases the user's hipfire accuracy by 33%.

Creates a toxic field that inflicts 100 damage per second to organic enemy targets in a 7 meter radius around the Combat Medic. Lasts up to 7 seconds.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
The Vanu's Ascension SX55 was created after the success of the SX11 heavy plasma pistol. It features a higher rate of fire than its heavier cousin with minimal compromises to lethality.
Earned by being the Valkyrie pilot when a passenger kills an enemy.

Creates a protective bubble around the Defector that blocks incoming projectiles using the Defector's health pool. While active, Defector's armor is increased by 60% and movement speed is decreased by 40%. Lasts up to 12 seconds. 45 second cooldown.
The Titan-150 HEAT is loaded with high-explosive anti-tank rounds that reload quickly and have balanced effectiveness against enemy armor and personnel. NC use only.
Are you sure you want to delete this character?
The Lightning tank has access to a powerful anti-aircraft flak cannon called the Skyguard.
The Infiltrator has access to several tools that can detect hostiles on the map for themselves and allies.

Representative Nalla of Nascent Expeditions requires a power source for a powerful surface-to-orbit communications unit. The verbally malfunctioning Black Market vendor, SPRK-33, has been known to trade in similarly obscure objects.
Are you sure you want to purchase %0 with certification points?
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
Increases the amount of rockets carried
Increases Merit & XP gains by 50% for 1 hour. Boost can only be used on this character.

<font color="#00FFAA">Tolland:</font> Which is why I am pleased to announce that you have been automatically certified to use the NE-11 PML, a tactical personal mining laser that breaks down Auraxium crystals for ease of transportation. Please equip it and proceed to the nearest dig site.
Allows cortium to be used to create a tower structure that can be used by infantry units. NC use only.
You have been disconnected from the server.
Drifter Jumpjets allow the user to safely glide across long distances for up to 7 seconds.
Use anti-vehicle weaponry to destroy an enemy tank.
Increases the range of the weapon.
We could not retrieve the appropriate information. Please try again.
The Quad 120mm Cannon AP is a high output weapon that is capable of inflicting maximum damage to heavily armored targets
Infuses the MAX with unstable energy for up to 16 seconds, increasing maximum damage output by 10% and movement speed slightly, but damage received is increased by 20%.
Earn points by holding Crystal Ridge Comm Array, Frostbite Harbor, Stillwater Watch, or Mattherson's Triumph.
Today Only! Solid Tan Camo Available!
This spire will damage enemy infantry and MAX within 15 meters.
Crouch to get through tight spaces, duck behind cover, or increase accuracy.
Apply the single use Indar Savanna camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Lightweight and flexible plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.

Creates a smoke screen around the vehicle which prevents you and nearby allied vehicles from automatically showing on minimap radar, and prevents lock-on attempts for 8 seconds. Can be used once every 30 seconds.
The [*faction*] has linked to the southwest warpgate +[*points*] VP!

Auraxis Firearms' first infantry-based rocket launcher introduces anti-armor lockon capabilities, complemented by a powerful warhead, as well as the ability to dumbfire the weapon against enemy infantry and air. NC use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Optional Lockon: Armor</font>
The easily controllable TAAP-20 was designed with the idea of limiting the recoil disadvantages of the typical machine pistol.
Improved brakes, turn, and roll. (More effective than previous rank)
Apply the Wave camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15.
The Obelisk long rifle makes up for its slow rate of fire with hard hitting rounds and a heat-based ammo pool. VS use only.
Reduces the delay before a depleted overshield begins recharging by 75%. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Enlightened one, our enemies are constructing makeshift facilities with their ANTs, operative. We must prevent them from establishing a foothold by destroying their bases and replacing them with our own.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 rounds.
The suppressor reduces the noise and muzzle flash generated by the firearm, and prevents the player from showing on the minimap when firing. Bullet velocity and effectiveness at range are reduced.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 missiles.
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
Bring joy to your enemies before you destroy them with this festive Holiday Song horn. All factions can use this gear.
The Banded Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Mineral Radar passively sweeps the area for Cortium nodes within 600 meters, highlighting them on the HUD.
Cannot join squad due to being an enemy.
Increases the amount of ammo carried
Protect your actual skull with this terrifying, fiery red skull helmet. Provides a +15% xp bonus when worn during the annual Halloween Event.

USE
From the map screen Right-click on a facility to install this module.

DESCRIPTION
Harassers and Flashes cost 30% fewer nanites when pulled from the target facility.

Each craft will produce 5 of this module.

Lasts 20 minutes. Additional modules of this type increase the duration 20 minutes up to a max of 60 minutes.
Lattice links connect each base. Your base must be fully secure before attempting to attack the next one.
Adds the Combustion Intake to the Galaxy. NC use only.
This customization adds a Green Olive decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Large wall that once fully constructed can withstand a moderate amount of damage.
Core Update: Your HIVE location was deemed too risky with so few friendlies in the area
To respawn, select a location from the menu and use the spawn button.
The Serpent VE92's overclocked power core interface allows for an extremely high rate of fire, making it a lethal opponent in close quarters combat. VS use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Nalla:</font> Welcome to Sanctuary. Stop by my kiosk at Nascent Expeditions. Like I said before, we have some details clarify if we're going to get everyone to Oshur in one piece.
Can carry 4 additional rockets of any type.
Adds red chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2025 rounds.
Sales for everyone on the Depot now!
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> Nascent Expeditions has put out a call for assistance and you will aid that cause. This will guarantee our presence on Oshur and allow us to counter any undesired actions from the Republic. Go see Nalla before the day is done.
Hold [%s] to hack the bridge terminal
Adds 24 rounds to the default magazine size.
Have a visual on a hostile Reaver.
Earned when a squadmate deploys directly into your Galaxy (requires you to be in it).
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1125 rounds.
Increases fuel capacity and regeneration speed by 8%.
This armor can only be worn by VS Heavy Assault troopers.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Prowler. TR use only.
Nanite based tool specialized to repair mechanical systems.
Allows squad members to respawn inside the Valkyrie as long as there is a squad member inside.
Increased shield penetration at the expense of slightly less damage against other target types.
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 50%.
The Focused Proton HE is a high explosive plasma cannon that ideal for inflicting maximum damage to soft targets. This cannon requires greater accuracy to be effective.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Anyway, I've been paying attention to your comings and goings here on Sanctuary these last few days and I noticed a pattern in what folks are searching for. That's right, friend. They're looking for love with a capital "L". And I've got just the way to do it.
Apply the Red Chrome camo pattern to your vehicle.
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> A small research team stripped of faction allegiance, sent for the first time through a dimensional anchor to explore what was on the other side.
Allows for the creation of a single reaver aircraft in the outfitwars game mode. Usable from the home base vehicle terminals by those who have outfit permission to use the item.

<font color="#dc9c36">No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.</font> Makes you undetectable to enemy detection equipment except when jumping or moving at sprint speed or faster.<font color="#dc9c36"> Tier 3 implant.</font>
Capture contribution experience is earned when standing near a capture point while the facility is in the process of being captured.
Adds orange chassis lights to the under carriage of the Vanguard. NC use only.
Earn a Copper Medal on 3 different weapons.
Wait for a message from Representative Foster.
The Adrenaline Pump increases sprint speed while equipped.
Decreases the amount of time required to switch fire modes for 2 hours. Rank 13 required.
Apply the Snow Aspen Forest camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
Adds 2 grenades to the default magazine size.
Spitfire Auto-Turrets are placed by engineers and automatically engage hostile infantry within 50 meters.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Reaver by 5KPH.
Deploys an Anti-Vehicle Phalanx turret that may be manned by allied players. TR only
Apply the Recon camo pattern to your armor.
VS Heavy Assault Personal Shield Rank 1
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 266 rounds.
Open yourself to possibilities with this crossbow duo. Each crossbow awards a special title upon reaching gold medal. All factions can use NS weapons.
Apply the Halftone camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Enemies you damage are auto-spotted.

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> So, stay on the lookout for our fallen warriors. Record their position and collect their dog tags. We owe it to them to recover their bodies and remember their names.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> It says that it's a Veridian Genetics keycard, but that's high military technology. Only an officer with the highest level of clearance would have one. You should return to the underground base and see what it unlocks.
Apply the Cells camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Survey area bravo located. Deploy the Signal Scanner relay within the noted area.
SPRK-33 is located behind the Black Market kiosk on Sanctuary.
Press "Z" (default) to voice chat with your squad.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
On a headshot kill, instantly restore 200 shield.
Spawns an NPC bomb that is just for visuals only
Rapidly locks on to and destroys aircraft
While active, the Transport Cloak drains the ANT's stored Cortium in exchange for limited invisibility. Consumes 200 Cortium per second.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> The heat signature looks like it's coming from beneath you. Continue below to investigate the source.
Lightweight swamp camo plating to complement the look of your soldier. VS use only.

Creates a protective bubble around the Defector that blocks incoming projectiles using the Defector's health pool. While active, Defector's armor is increased by 60% and movement speed is decreased by 40%. Lasts up to 10 seconds. 50 second cooldown.
Adds 38 rounds to the default magazine size.
Contains a NS Baron G5 plus 1000 Certs

Celebrate eight years of PlanetSide 2 with this massive bundle. Note: Bundle contains weapons and cosmetics for all empires. Visit the Nascent Expeditions shop in Sanctuary to customize your Drop Pod. Boost and Implant Packs are only available to the character who purchased the bundle.
Nanite Systems continues working to defuse a second burgeoning disaster. Representative Foster charges you with continuing to build up and bolster the defenses of three staging sites on Esamir.
The L105 Zephyr PX fires a salvo of 105mm high-explosive rounds which are effective against both armor and personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

Unlocks the Analysis HUD implant. While equipped, the player will be able to locate campaign targets from much further away. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.</font>
The SCION X12 carries the furthest zoom depth of the entire SCION lineup, and is commonly associated with assassination-oriented weapon setups.

Creates a smoke screen around the vehicle which prevents you and nearby allied vehicles from automatically showing on minimap radar, and prevents lock-on attempts for 8 seconds. Can be used once every 32 seconds.

The Focused Proton PPA is a highly effective pulsed particle acceleration plasma cannon. It has an increased rate of fire which comes at a cost of lower armor penetration. This cannon requires greater accuracy to be effective.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Be mindful when around friendly vehicles. They don't always see or stop for pedestrians!
You currently own 1 or more of these.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 17 shells.
Neutrazlie a fourth vehicle and return it to your Warpgate
Apply the Sakura camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Gunnery Officer:</font> Target ouf ot range. Will commence firing when we are brought in range.
Support Planetside 2 by becoming a Member or this puppy may starve!
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
A spawn unit has been destroyed.
Mass Drivers are capable of launching two 50mm rounds accurately and at a high speed. The Mass Driver must reload after each shot. TR use only.
Apply the Patriot camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Capture and hold all 3 Amp Stations on Indar

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner</font> I am being told that your next assignment is to sabotage Biolab consoles on other continents. Please equip your Infiltration suit, and ensure your assigned team remains unaware of this goal.
The ruins of Northpoint Station can be found near the Shattered Warpgate.
Allows Light Assault to use Smoke Grenades.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32 rockets.

Clear the waters with a loud declaration before splashing in or emit a sonar ping while stalking your enemies below the waves. This horn plays different sounds when above or below the water. VS use only.
Must complete the "Nanite Systems Job Offer" mission granted at BR20.
Increases the power of the deployment shield by 60%.

USE
From the map screen Right-click on a facility to install this module.

DESCRIPTION
Sunderers and ANTs cost 30% fewer nanites when pulled from the target facility.

Each craft will produce 5 of this module.

Lasts 20 minutes. Additional modules of this type increase the duration 20 minutes up to a max of 60 minutes.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 54 rounds.
Single Use Indar Highlands v2 Camo
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Razor Fins. TR use only.
Unlock the HSG-400 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
The enemy is now losing control of the region and soon it will belong to us.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Unlock the Urban Forest camo pattern for your armor, weapons and vehicles. VS use only.
Reduces damage taken from projectiles and explosives while shields are active.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Greetings operative, Esamir clearly needs our help. Please advance to the nearest allied Containment Site.
Adds Hubcaps Base to your Sunderer. (DNT)
Adds a bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this item.

Unlocks the Caltrop for your tactical loadout slot. These are resupplied using Merit points.

Single use consumable. Max 4 between resupplies.
Deploys a Caltrop tank trap that inhibits the movement of vehicles. Lasts 30 minutes or until destroyed. Can only be deployed outdoors.
Demonstrate mastery in five different weapons in the carbine family.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.
Uploads targeting coordinates to an orbiting weapons platform capable of firing a highly destructive particle beam.
Slows and disorients enemies within its blast radius.
Incomplete Directive challenges can be pinned to your HUD to track their progress as you play. Open a Directive line and click which challenge you'd like to track.
Unlock the SR-L75 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Reduce the acquire timer of the Liberator for 1 hour. Rank 10 required.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 50 rounds.
Kill bounty targets with an SMG.
Apply the Temperate Chaparral camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Personalize your Sunderer with custom hubcaps. NC use only.
Mineral Radar passively sweeps the area for Cortium nodes within 300 meters, highlighting them on the HUD.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Oh these readings don't look good.
NC - Sniper Rifle - Long - V13 Description(Delete Me -BB)

Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second, prevents the vehicle from being auto detected on the mini-map and reduces detection from enemy Engagement Radars by 400 meters.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Unlocks one new infantry and vehicle custom loadout for all classes and vehicles on all characters on this account.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Enhances the Infiltrator's HUD with the ability to detect nearby explosives
The TRS-12 Uppercut's highly mobile platform provides great versatility and speed while engaging multiple targets. TR use only.
The Eridani SX5 fully automatic submachine gun excels in close quarter combat situations. VS use only.
Apply the single use Pine Forest camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Vertical recoil is reduced by 20%, and the weapon becomes semi-automatic, allowing for ease of handling at longer ranges.
You must leave your current outfit before applying.
Lots of chatter right now, exciting times we're living in. You ever heard of The Interface? Neither did I until recently. Super hush hush as far as New Conglomerate goes.
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> We have gained access to this network, please move on to the next target.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 563 rounds.
Increases the number of medical kits that can be carried to 4.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
You've proven worthy of Vanu's legacy.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Hey buddy. I've got a job for you on Esamir if you're interested. I'll drop you a line with more info the next time you're out in that frozen deathtrap.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Reaver to 18 minutes.
Earn experience by taking and defending control points.
Contains schematics for the Elysium Spawn Tube, Light Vehicle Terminal, Vehicle Ammo Dispenser, and a Light Air Terminal. Useable by all factions.
You automatically repair 25 health every second. Damage disables repairs for 10 seconds.
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.

Allows the Colossus to operate as a respawn point when deployed.

Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details about deployed mode.
The semi-auto N203 assault rifle retains accuracy through a controlled, three-round burst, while offering stopping power that rivals that of heavier weapons. NSO use only.
Thank you for the assistance here. Consider this experiment concluded. I will contact you when we've decided on our next steps.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 113 rounds.
Squad leaders cannot use squad deploy.
Increases the top speed of the Flash by 6 KPH.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 9.375%
Allied forces are gathering for a convoy at our warpgate. Check map for location.
Contains a LC2 Lynx plus 1000 Certs
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
TR: MAX: Flame 01: Right Auraxium Medal
The burst fire variant of the TRAC-5 provides accurate and controllable firepower suitable for any number of situations. TR use only.
Apply the single use Giraffe camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
The SMG-46 Armistice fully automatic submachine gun features an extremely fast rate of fire. TR use only.
Increases the amount of damage the deployment shield can withstand by 30%.
Sticky Grenades attach themselves to most surfaces when thrown.
With its larger magazine and cone of fire, the Storm LC allows Scythe pilots to be less accurate with their shots and still be able to land hits. VS Use Only.
Allows use of the 4x PVQ-40A scope

Increases the top speed of the Liberator by 5 KPH.

Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 28 meters.

Allows cortium to be used to construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret that may be manned by allied players. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with another construction item(s).
Adds 13 rounds to the default magazine size.

Darius Shield recharges faster when offline. From 0 to full within 25 seconds.

Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.

Resupplies ammo to all allied vehicles within 75 meters, and does not affect the Galaxy itself.

And this is the technocratic <font color="#c27fff">Vanu Sovereignty</font>. a cult obsessed with a lost alien civilization and its technology. They seek to strip away our humanity and force us to serve their so-called "God."
